CO-FOUNDER for Learnetto (https://learnetto.com) | London, UK | ONSITE

I'm looking for a co-founder for my education startup Learnetto.

Learnetto is a marketplace where anyone can teach and sell a course on useful tech skills including programming, design, product management and marketing.

Business model: We take a small cut (25%) of the sales.

I've built most of the product myself with some help from freelancers.

We have a bunch of teachers and students already.

The market seems crowded but I think there's room for a better marketplace, where the terms for teachers are fair and reasonable (https://learnetto.com/teachers) and students get an awesome place to learn. So I'm building it.

WHAT I CAN OFFER YOU

Equity.

A chance to build an exciting and fun business in an exploding market with a technical cofounder who can sell (that's me!).

WHAT I'M LOOKING FOR

I'm looking for someone who can build product and also understands and cares about the business. Someone who has worked on their own projects, startup or business.

TECH STACK

Rails 4 app on Heroku, videos hosted on Wistia, Stripe for payments.

Lots more details here - https://medium.com/@hrishio/an-open-letter-to-my-future-co-f...

If you're up for building an awesome online education business together, email me - hrishi@learnetto.com
